## ScreenCaptureOptions class

截屏(录屏)参数  module:ScreenCapture

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export class ScreenCaptureOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [eyeType](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.eyetype.md) |  | [EyeType](./extractor.eyetype.md) | 截屏(录屏)种类，左眼、右眼、双眼, 默认 left  { EyeType } |
|  [flags](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.flags.md) |  | number | 截屏控制参数，默认为0  { number } |
|  [height](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.height.md) |  | number | 截屏高度,默认为0,为0时将使用默认宽度(屏幕高度)  { number } |
|  [identifier](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.identifier.md) |  | number | 标识符, 由用户设置，将在回调中被传回，用于确认发起者, 默认0  { number } |
|  [region](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.region.md) |  | [ScreenRectFloat](./extractor.screenrectfloat.md) | 截屏范围,从左下角开始, 默认全屏(0,0,1,1)  { module:ScreenCaptureCommon.ScreenRectFloat } |
|  [width](./extractor.screencaptureoptions.width.md) |  | number | 截屏宽度,默认为0,为0时将使用默认宽度(屏幕宽度)  { number } |
